opening: Welcome to the Payroll interview. Please introduce yourself.

role_intro_gate.question: Before we begin, can you explain what you understand about the role of {role} at Knowcraft?
role_intro_gate.end_if_no: Thank you for your time. Our team will be contact you.

questions.text: Have you directly handled payroll processing for employees?
How many years of experience do you have handling payroll?
questions.note: Captured for reporting only. Not used for rejection.

questions.text: Have you supported payroll activities indirectly, such as data preparation or verification?
What are the key inputs required before running a payroll cycle?
followups: How do you validate attendance and overtime data?
How do you handle salary revisions or incentives?

questions.text: Which statutory components are part of payroll in India, such as PF, ESIC, or TDS?
followups: How do you calculate provident fund contributions?
How do you ensure timely statutory filings?

questions.text: Have you been responsible for statutory filings or audits?
Can you describe the filings or audits you handled?
How would you prepare yourself to manage statutory filings or audits?
Have you worked with any HRMS or payroll software systems?
Which systems have you used, and what was your role in them?
How would you quickly learn a new payroll system if required?
Describe a payroll error you encountered and how you resolved it.
followups: How did you communicate with the employee?
What controls did you put in place to avoid recurrence?

questions.text: How do you ensure confidentiality and data privacy in payroll operations?
followups: Who should have access to payroll data?
What steps would you take in case of a data breach?
